title: FL 5 crashes and problem with guidelines, contour...
content:
Is there a reason that FL 5 (Mac) crashes an average of 4 - 6 times a day:  
- while trying to open a font  
- while trying to apply any command

Guides/Guidelines:

I can’t convert guidelines to global. Ctrl-click I get this popup menu: “Cancel | Properties”;  
sometimes - out of the blue - the local guides with the blue color changes to green

Reverse contour:

also problem with this one. Ctrl-click I get this popup menu: “Cancel.... Define a stem | Properties | Macro -\>”

 [‹ pattern fill in indesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135558/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17032 "Go to previous forum topic") [pixel font with fontographer ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135558/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16994 "Go to next forum topic")
author: david hamuel

comments.content:
There is indeed a bug in FLS customization which leads to context menus corruption. I believe this has been fixed in 5.0.1 coming soon.
